heading: Fun facts
lines: Solarized, the color scheme in use here has many unique properties such as reducing eye-fatigue.
Using only a keyboard, you can fully access and navigate the site. Look for shortcuts in [ ].
The site is jam-packed with easter eggs, most elements have funny title text and the 404 page is ðŸ”¥!
Please use Firefox. My hatred of Chrome is a raging fire that burns with the passion of a million suns.
